Function# IOSimpleLockDestroy

macOS 10.15+

```
void IOSimpleLockDestroy(IOSimpleLock *lock);
```

## [See Also](/documentation/kernel/3380136-iosimplelockdestroy#see-also)

### [Simple Locks](/documentation/kernel/3380136-iosimplelockdestroy#simple-locks)

[`IOSimpleLockAlloc`](/documentation/kernel/1553017-iosimplelockalloc)Allocates and initializes a spin lock.[`IOSimpleLockInit`](/documentation/kernel/1552990-iosimplelockinit)Initialize a spin lock.[`IOSimpleLockFree`](/documentation/kernel/1553035-iosimplelockfree)Frees a spin lock.[`IOSimpleLockGetMachLock`](/documentation/kernel/1553019-iosimplelockgetmachlock)Accessor to a Mach spin lock.[`IOSimpleLockLock`](/documentation/kernel/1552997-iosimplelocklock)Lock a spin lock.[`IOSimpleLockLockDisableInterrupt`](/documentation/kernel/1553005-iosimplelocklockdisableinterrupt)Lock a spin lock.[`IOSimpleLockTryLock`](/documentation/kernel/1553029-iosimplelocktrylock)Attempt to lock a spin lock.[`IOSimpleLockUnlock`](/documentation/kernel/1553015-iosimplelockunlock)Unlock a spin lock.[`IOSimpleLockUnlockEnableInterrupt`](/documentation/kernel/1552998-iosimplelockunlockenableinterrup)Unlock a spin lock, and restore interrupt state.
